description: This file defines a RealtimeService class for handling server-sent events (SSE) in a Flutter application. It manages connections to an SSE endpoint, processes incoming JSON data streams, and exposes a stream of events to other parts of the application.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A class that provides client-side handling for real-time event streaming over SSE, including connecting, disconnecting, and event stream management.

methods.name: RealtimeService
methods.description: Constructor for RealtimeService, optionally accepts an HTTP client.

methods.name: get events
methods.description: Getter that returns a broadcast stream of decoded JSON events received from the SSE server.

methods.name: _isEnabled
methods.description: Checks whether the real-time updates are enabled based on environment variables.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the specified SSE endpoint, listening for incoming events and parsing JSON data.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Disconnects from the SSE stream and cancels the subscription.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources by disconnecting and closing the stream controller and HTTP client.
